sentences.en: 90 per cent of listeners had stayed with the programme when it changed its time slot.
sentences.cn: 节目改变播送时段后，90%的听众依然继续收听。

sentences.en: Alan dropped another quarter into the slot on the pay phone.
sentences.cn: 艾伦往付费电话的投币口里又塞了一枚 25 分的硬币。

sentences.en: Can we slot her into a job in the sales department?
sentences.cn: 我们能把她安排在销售部工作 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you slot her into a job in the sales department?
sentences.cn: 你能把她安排在销售部工作 吗 ?

sentences.en: He dropped a coin into the slot and dialed.
sentences.cn: 他往投币孔里投了一枚硬币，然后拨了电话。

sentences.en: He dropped a coin into the slot and dialled.
sentences.cn: 他把一枚硬币投进了那个投币口，然后拨了号。

sentences.en: He was slotting a CD into a CD player.
sentences.cn: 他正把一张光盘放入光盘播放器中。

sentences.en: I dropped a quarter into the slot of the pay phone.
sentences.cn: 我向付费电话的投币孔里投了一枚25分硬币。

sentences.en: Insert coins into the slot and press for a ticket.
sentences.cn: 把硬币放进投币口，按钮取票。

sentences.en: It is noteworthy that the programme has been shifted from its original August slot to July.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是该节目已从原来8月份的档期换到了7月份。

sentences.en: My friend put me in a white - collar slot .
sentences.cn: 我朋友使我从事一份 白领 工作.

sentences.en: Put a coin in the slot.
She now has her own parking slot on the catwalk level.
sentences.cn: 现在,她在人行小道上有自己的停车点了.

sentences.en: She placed her card in a slot on the outside the bank.
sentences.cn: 她在银行外面把她的卡片塞进一条窄缝.

sentences.en: The car seat belt slotted into place easily.
sentences.cn: 那个汽车安全带很容易就扣好了。

sentences.en: The curtain hooks run along a slot in the curtain rail.
sentences.cn: 窗的吊钩可沿轨槽滑动.

sentences.en: to put some coins in the slot
sentences.cn: 往投币口中塞几个硬币

sentences.en: You buy this bookcase in sections and slot them together.
sentences.cn: 你分组件买这个书橱,再把它们卡榫对准组合在一起.

sentences.en: You slip the token into the slot at the turnstile.
sentences.cn: 你在入口处那儿把辅币塞进投币孔.

words.tran_cn: 位置；狭槽；水沟；硬币投币口

phrases.tran_cn: 时间空档；（电视或广播电台的）播放时段

trans.tran_cn: 窄缝，扁口，（时间表、计划中的）时段，位置
trans.tran_en: a long narrow hole in a surface, that you can put something into
If you slot something into something else, or if it slots into it, you put it into a space where it fits

trans.tran_cn: 把…放入狭长开口中； 把…纳入其中， 使有位置
trans.tran_en: If you slot something into something else, or if it slots into it, you put it into a space where it fits
